articles.author: Sunil Jagtiani
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for Dec. 27 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Most Asian stocks dipped Monday, while U.S. equity futures rose, as traders looked for direction amid spiking coronavirus cases as well as a weekend pledge of greater economic support from China’s central bank.
articles.content: Most Asian stocks dipped Monday, while U.S. equity futures rose, as traders looked for direction amid spiking coronavirus cases as well as a weekend pledge of greater economic support from China’s ce… [+195 chars]

articles.title: Jacky Wu asks for heavy sentence after son nabbed over drug use - AsiaOne
articles.description: Jacky Wu's son Ricky got into trouble again. This time, the 23-year-old musician, who goes by the name LucyPIE, was caught smoking marijuana outside a Taipei nightclub early Sunday (Dec 26) morning. While Ricky was chatting with friends outside the venue, pol…
articles.content:
Jacky Wu's son Ricky got into trouble again.
This time, the 23-year-old musician, who goes by the name LucyPIE, was caught smoking marijuana outside a Taipei nightclub early Sunday (Dec 26) morning.… [+1247 chars]

articles.title: Eyimofe makes Guardian UK's best films from Africa, Asia, Latin America list - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Eyimofe has been picked along with nine others on a shortlist of top films from Africa, Asia and Latin America by The Guardian of the UK.
articles.content:
Eyimofe (This Is My Desire), directed by twin brothers Arie Esiri and Chuko Esiri. Photograph: Everett Collection Inc/Alamy

articles.title: Showbiz veteran Jenny Tseng slams Li Jinglei for going too far in public divorce spat with Wang Leehom - AsiaOne
articles.description: Li Jinglei may have called for a truce on her and ex-husband Wang Leehom's very public spat over their divorce, but it seems the brouhaha has yet to die down. The 35-year-old's explosive posts after their divorce announcement on Dec 16 have not only tarnished…
